mapper.select: select * from chat c join employee emp on c.name = emp.emp_no where c.chat_room_seq = #{chat_room_seq} order by c.chat_seq asc
mapper.insert: insert into chat(chat_seq, chat_room_seq, name, sender, message, send_time, read_count) values(chat_seq.NEXTVAL, #{chat_room_seq}, #{name}, #{sender}, #{message}, SYSDATE, #{read_count})
